ygData.subject: Re: Playing on Test server
ygData.msgSnippet: Bree, I think that is wonderful.  I tried creating new characters on other servers but what I found was that while I didn t miss the twinking I did with my
ygData.messageBody:
Bree, I think that is wonderful. I tried creating new characters on other
servers but what I found was that while I didn't miss the "twinking" I did
with my other babies on The Rathe, what I DID miss were my friends and my
guild and all the things we did together. (Can't live without green spam!!)
So for me, going to another server isn't really an option right now. It's
really the people that keep me coming back to EQ, not just the game. If I
could bundle them all up and take them to Test, I would, but unfortunately,
it isn't gonna happen.

Mik
----- Original Message -----
From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 7:45 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Playing on Test server


> From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>
> My Friends and I are burned out quite a bit on Fennin Ro, way too crowded,
> and the Planes are near to impossible half the time. Well, we decided to
> take a break and I am having a blast.
>
> We created characters on the test server. No Spam, No crowding, and no
> problems so far about finding stuff to hunt. We are still very young yet
> though and it is fun having to work for all our stuff again. On Fennin We
> could create newbie and give them things, but on test we can't "twink" so
it
> feels just like it did when I started out on March 18th.
> I made a cleric again, while my friends made classes that are different
form
> what their high levels on Fennin are. My thought are I have always liked
> playign the cleric and well if we are gonna go anywhere on Test, you have
to
> have a cleric so I am happy to repeat.
>
> Just thought I would share that with everyone, I am having a blast once
> again =)
>
> Bree, 50th cleric of Fennin Ro
> Laurelei, 4th cleric of Test
>
>
